## Overview

To improve readability and ease the implementation of unconventional techniques 
required to load and structure data from sources which are expected to vary or 
have no structure at all.

## Installation

```{r, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("AltraSol/vary")
```

## Usage

After installation from GitHub, you can load it with:

```{r}
library(vary)
```
